title: Brett Andersen: Jordan Peterson is Right about Chaos and Order
description:
Brett is a graduate student in psychology focusing his work on Jordan Peterson's Maps of Meaning

Notes
Psychotic break

Jordan Peterson

Maps of Meaning

Diametric model of autism and psychosis

Pattern along the diametric model

Extension of the argument in maps of meaning, biological evolution, culture history 

WE tell stories, the hero story

We abstract out the general pattern, we have an insight

Hyper condensed narratives

Meta-mythology 

Role of the hero figure to stand at the border of chaos and order

JBP connects it to neuro science, 

They stumbled upon the optimal pattern of beha

Self-organized criticality

Signatures of self-organized criticality, Vervaeke the flow state

Self-organizing: ordered state: rigid frozen, chaotic state, uncorrolated with each other, gas or vapor

Critical state: phased transition between ordered and chaotic. 

Critical state is the optimal state for biological systems. 

Dynamics in action: book

The only way to understand this is in the way of a narrative

Structure of narrative: same as that structure

It builds a bridge: there is a value structure built into that. 

Pageau, the fractal structure of narrative

Evolution's arrow: there is a direction to evolution: increasing complexity

Robert Wright's book Nonzero https://amzn.to/3rssdS6

Increasing integration and simultaneous 

Suffering

What you want is meta-stability

You have to put yourself in a dynamic situation where things are not optical and stable

Responsibility: to take responsibility

Akira the Don: the transcendence of suffering: the abyss stares into you

Here's what happens if you take on maximal responsibility

Pattern plays out over history

Dynamics in Action: Book: Alicia Juarrero https://amzn.to/3rDqn0S

Western philosophy 

McGilchrist

Since the advent of agriculture: effectively stabilized the environment

What brought agriculture around was the stabilization of the climate

Why Jordan Peterson and the Bible Map: 

Did God have a wife: book

Madness and Modernism: book Louis Sass https://amzn.to/2KBQcNV

What happens in psychosis, you get your foundations knocked out. 

Speculative hypothesis: We lost our foundations. 

The Return of the Great Mother

Alfred North Whitehead

Non-Zero Robert Wright

Process of increasing scope of cooperative groups

Importance of communication

Logos: process that produces true speech

Flow State as cascade of insight: Increase and decrease of entropy, re-emergence into a higher order

Psilocybin: to bring the brain closer to that state

Instinct of meaning brings you to that border

"Jordan Peterson was right" 

Has to be bottom up solution
